Rosa Trevino
------------

Rosie Trevino has held a variety of positions with the City as Finance Director for 14 years,  Peace Officer and Personnel Director.  She is a native of La Joya, Texas.

![rosie trevino_edited.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/62f94d_aa7f9b5215c54a5a9d5d7878cc17bccc~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_281,h_489,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/62f94d_aa7f9b5215c54a5a9d5d7878cc17bccc~mv2.jpg)

The Finance Department provides support for other municipal departments, the City Manager and the City Council.  The Department has an Accounting Division and a Purchasing Division.

[News](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/news)

![Calculator](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/da73c50a72bc4ea4ba2fb7f20892a464.jpg/v1/crop/x_582,y_0,w_3995,h_3648/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Calculator.jpg)

Texas law requires municipalities to complete an annual audit.

![SP-Global on Wall Street Stock Exchange](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/3c0551_fff70b461ea94bc097eb2eebdc8219b7~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_248,y_0,w_765,h_699/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/SP-Global_edited.jpg)


[S&P Global](https://www.spglobal.com/en/)
rated La Joya as "
A
" investment grade.  La Joya is the only city west of Mission with a bond rating.

![Bill](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/aedf3dceccd24a0ca6c446113a3c127b.jpg/v1/crop/x_384,y_0,w_1232,h_1125/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Bill.jpg)

The City Council is required to approve an annual budget by September 30.

[Public Funds Investment Act](https://statutes.capitol.texas.gov/Docs/GV/htm/GV.2256.htm)

The Finance Director serves as Chair of the Public Funds Investment Committee, which guides the City's investments.

The City invests funds in
[TexSTAR](https://www.texstar.org/)
and
[Local Government Investment Cooperative (LOGIC)](https://www.logic.org/)
investment pools.
